current_task: Add recency bonus - prioritize recently added music
message: Added dateAdded-based recency scoring. Items added in last week get 3x bonus, last month 2x, last 3 months 1.5x. Also position bonus for recently-played (first = most recent). This should push Macklemore and Cranberries (recently added) to the top!

action_required.why: Adds dateAdded recency bonus to prioritize recent music
